description: Adversaries may look for details about the network configuration and settings of systems they access or through information discovery of remote systems Author: frack113, Christopher Peacock '@securepeacock', SCYTHE '@scythe_io'. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Network Command
query: process.command_line:(*ipconfig\ \/all* OR *netsh\ interface\ show\ interface* OR *arp\ \-a* OR *nbtstat\ \-n* OR *net\ config* OR *route\ print*)
